parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: FileSystemType
parameters.description:
The type of the file system.

Valid value: extreme, which indicates Extreme NAS file systems.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: SnapshotIds
parameters.description:
The snapshot IDs.

You can specify a maximum of 100 snapshot IDs. You must separate snapshot IDs with commas (,).

parameters.name: SnapshotType
parameters.description:
The type of the snapshot.

Valid values:

*   auto: auto snapshot
*   user: manual snapshot
*   all (default): all snapshot types

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the snapshot.

Valid values:

*   progressing: The snapshot is being created.
*   accomplished: The snapshot is created.
*   failed: The snapshot fails to be created.
*   all (default): all snapshot states.
